title: 11-year-old boy shot in east Houston
content:
HOUSTON - A young boy was shot and wounded at a home in east Houston, police said.
It happened in the 300 block of De Haven around 9:25 p.m. Sunday.
Police at the scene said the boy, 11, appeared to be the victim of an accidental shooting. He was rushed to the hospital where he was in critical condition at last check.
Police spoke to several witnesses at the home. No charges have been filed at this time as the investigation continues.
The child's identity has not been released.
